actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to establish more effective procedures for the conduct of hearings, and the appointment of hearing examiners, with respect to claims under such title or title XVIII of such act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Establishes procedures for the conduct of hearings, and the appointment of hearing examiners, with respect to claims under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) and title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to establish more effective procedures for the conduct of hearings, and the appointment of hearing examiners, with respect to claims under such title or title XVIII of such act.
